overview:
Ravi Dronamraju was an early yahoo engineer. He was instrumental in building the hugely popular Yahoo! Finance portal. He lead development for Yahoo Classifieds and Yahoo! Autos during his time at Yahoo!. After Yahoo! - Ravi founded nesteggr.com - web 2.0 finance site. Nesteggr.com had ~75K unique users per month. Nesteggr.com was shutdown in June 2008.

Ravi is now consulting as VP engineering for various silicon valley startups.
